name: AHCHRSNScreening
title: AHC HRSN Screening
description: This is a SDC Questionnaire example that represents the [Accountable health communities (AHC) health-related social needs screening (HRSN) tool](https://innovation.cms.gov/files/worksheets/ahcm-screeningtool.pdf) defined in LOINC (code 96777-8). This example contains no actual questions, but is used to provide metadata about the assessment tool.

code.display: Accountable health communities (AHC) health-related social needs screening (HRSN) tool
